text:
### Steps to reproduce
1. install pylint from pypi (1.7.2)
2. clone astroid master as of 3-Sept-2017
3. pip install -U astroid/ to update to astroid master (to work around a bug in 1.5.3)
4. pylint files with classes

### Current behavior

************* Module eyeop.hosting
W: 47, 0: Unused variable '__class__' (unused-variable)
W: 47, 0: Unused variable '__class__' (unused-variable)

W:148, 0: Unused variable '__class__' (unused-variable)

### Expected behavior

no false positives

### ``python -c "from astroid import __pkginfo__; print(__pkginfo__.version)"`` output
title: pylint: Unused variable '__class__' (unused-variable)

text: Upgrading to pylint master makes this go away. Sorry for the bogus report.
